name: Behind the Fog
description:
How fun can be exploring a map the size of a screen? You can find out with Behind the Fog.

In this game, your main purpose is explore the four corners of the map, finding out places and discovering new events, trying to understand what happened.

Go near something interesting in the map and press Space to find out what it is and find new items that you can use for exploring further.

Controls:
- Arrow keys: move around
- Space: ecamine your surroundings, skip dialogue
- left ctrl: bring up the completion menu

Objective: find out everything on the map.
